template.name: My JetPack Activity
template.description: Creates a new activity and with view model

parameter.name: Activity Name
parameter.help: The name of the activity class to create

parameter.name: Activity Layout Name
parameter.help: The name of the layout to create for the activity

parameter.name: ViewModel Name
parameter.help: The name of the view model class to create

parameter.name: Create DataModel Class
parameter.help: If true, a DataModel class will be created

parameter.name: DataModel Name
parameter.help: The name of the data model class to create

parameter.name: Activity Route Path
parameter.help: The route path of the activity title to create

parameter.name: Activity Title Name
parameter.help: The name of the activity title to create

parameter.name: Activity Title
parameter.help: The title of the activity to create

parameter.name: Launcher Activity
parameter.help: If true, this activity will have a CATEGORY_LAUNCHER intent filter, making it visible in the launcher

parameter.name: Associate a URL with this Activity
parameter.help: If true, this activity will be associated with URL, improving discovery of your Instant App

parameter.name: Instant App URL Host
parameter.help: The domain to use in the Instant App route for this activity

parameter.name: Instant App URL Route Type
parameter.help: The type of route to use in the Instant App route for this activity

parameter.name: Instant App URL Route
parameter.help: The route to use in the Instant App route for this activity
